statements: SELECT * FROM shipments;
SELECT medication_name, manufacturer_name, quantity FROM shipments WHERE distributor_name='ABC Distributors';
SELECT shipment_date, medication_name FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, COUNT(*) AS num_shipments FROM shipments GROUP BY manufacturer_name;
SELECT medication_name, quantity, shipment_date FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date >= '2023-01-01' AND shipment_date <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM shipments WHERE manufacturer_name='ABC Pharma' ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(shipment_id) AS total_shipments FROM shipments WHERE distributor_name='XYZ Distributors';
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT manufacturer_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM shipments GROUP BY manufacturer_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, medication_name, manufacturer_name, distributor_name, shipment_date, quantity FROM shipments WHERE medication_name='Paracetamol' AND quantity > 100 ORDER BY shipment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturers;
SELECT name, location FROM manufacturers WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM distributors WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name, location FROM distributors WHERE manufacturer_id = 2;
SELECT manufacturer_id, name, location FROM manufacturers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM manufacturers WHERE location='USA' ORDER BY name;
SELECT manufacturer_id, name, location FROM manufacturers WHERE name LIKE '%Corp%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT m.name AS Manufacturer, d.name AS Distributor, d.location AS Distributor_Location FROM manufacturers m INNER JOIN distributors d ON m.manufacturer_id = d.manufacturer_id;
SELECT * FROM manufacturers WHERE location='Europe' OR location='Asia' ORDER BY location, name;
SELECT * FROM Manufacturer ORDER BY manufacturer_id ASC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, manufacturer_location FROM Manufacturer WHERE manufacturer_name = 'ABC Pharmaceuticals';
SELECT medication_name, medication_type FROM Medication WHERE medication_type = 'Painkiller';
SELECT * FROM Distributor WHERE distributor_location = 'New York';
SELECT distributor_name, distributor_location FROM Distributor ORDER BY distributor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Manufacturer ORDER BY manufacturer_id DESC
SELECT manufacturer_name, manufacturer_location FROM Manufacturer WHERE manufacturer_location LIKE '%USA%'
SELECT manufacturer_name, COUNT(*) as total_medications FROM Manufacturer INNER JOIN Medication ON Manufacturer.manufacturer_id = Medication.manufacturer_id GROUP BY Manufacturer.manufacturer_name
SELECT * FROM Medication WHERE medication_type='Painkiller' AND medication_name LIKE '%acetaminophen%'
SELECT distributor_name, distributor_location FROM Distributor ORDER BY distributor_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Manufacturer;
SELECT name, location FROM Manufacturer;
SELECT * FROM Manufacturer WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM Manufacturer WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM Manufacturer ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Manufacturer WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM Manufacturer WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Manufacturer WHERE location LIKE 'C%';
SELECT manufacturer_id, name FROM Manufacturer ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Manufacturer WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM manufacturers;
SELECT distributor_name, distributor_location FROM distributors;
SELECT medication_name, medication_type FROM medications ORDER BY medication_type DESC;
SELECT shipment_date FROM shipments WHERE distributor_id = 1;
SELECT tracking_id, location, status FROM tracking WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY tracking_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturers;
SELECT manufacturer_name, manufacturer_location FROM manufacturers WHERE manufacturer_location='USA';

SELECT m.manufacturer_name, d.distributor_name, s.shipment_date FROM manufacturers m JOIN medications md ON m.manufacturer_id = md.manufacturer_id JOIN shipments s ON md.medication_id = s.medication_id JOIN distributors d ON s.distributor_id = d.distributor_id;

SELECT m.medication_name, s.shipment_date, t.location, t.status FROM medications m JOIN shipments s ON m.medication_id = s.medication_id JOIN tracking t ON s.shipment_id = t.shipment_id WHERE m.medication_type='Tablet' AND t.status='In Transit';

SELECT m.medication_name, d.distributor_name, t.location, t.status FROM medications m JOIN shipments s ON m.medication_id = s.medication_id JOIN tracking t ON s.shipment_id = t.shipment_id JOIN distributors d ON s.distributor_id = d.distributor_id WHERE d.distributor_location='Europe';
